title: Two Big Netflix Bulls Are Now Less Optimistic About the Stock Price
text:
Even Netflix’s biggest advocates are becoming less upbeat about the stock’s price. Two major Wall Street banks—Goldman Sachs Group and UBS—dramatically lowered their price targets overnight for the streaming-video company.

This year has brought a roller-coaster ride for Netflix (ticker: NFLX) shareholders. The stock was up as much as 44% year to date in early May, but has fallen hard since July, when the company reported the first decline in its base of paid U.S. subscribers since 2011. Its shares are now up just 3% on the...
description: Goldman Sachs Group and UBS dramatically lowered their price targets for the streaming-video company.
